data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 28, 2024, the equity shares of Deepak Builders and Engineers India Ltd (Scrip Code: 544276) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of ''B'' Group Securities.
